__e: I thought it was a fire alarm, and then the... person in front of me in line doubled over, and then I just fell to the floor.
But the final straw was... one night I heard some noise on my fire escape... so I called 9, and the cops came eventually.
And I started climbing down this fire escape... And then I heard a cop yell to put your hands up, so I did and I fell... onto him.
